ending_saint.text:
THE SAINT ENDING

Day 47. You saved 63 people. The trauma broke you, but you kept your humanity. They call you a hero.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

ending_survivor.text:
THE SURVIVOR ENDING

Day 47. You did what you had to. 15 people alive. Not a hero, not a villain. Just alive.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

ending_tyrant.text:
THE TYRANT ENDING

Day 47. You rule 94 through fear. Your word is law. Power is all that matters.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

ending_broken.text:
THE BROKEN ENDING

Day 47. You're alive physically. Mentally shattered. The trauma won.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

ending_manipulator.text:
THE MANIPULATOR ENDING

Day 47. You control 47 people through lies. You feel nothing.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

ending_lone_wolf.text:
THE LONE WOLF ENDING

Day 47. Completely alone. You trust no one. Need no one.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

start.text:
Day 0, 8:00 AM

You wake to frantic pounding on your door.

'PLEASE! OH GOD PLEASE OPEN UP!'

It's Alex from 4B. Through the peephole: torn scrubs, blood-soaked, bite marks on his left arm with dark veins spreading.

Behind him: shuffling, wet dragging sounds, inhuman moaning.

What do you do?

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror. More details here.

choices.text: Open the door and pull him inside
Stay silent - don't reveal you're home
Ask what happened through the door
Check the window to see what's outside first

alex_inside.text:
You yank Alex inside. He collapses, gasping. The bite is deep, veins spreading fast.

'Pills... pocket... experimental...'

You find 6 pills. You give them to him. The spreading STOPS. He's alive. But still infected.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Stay with him and monitor his condition
Restrain him in case the pills fail
Search his pockets for more information
Check your apartment for supplies while he rests

alex_stable.text:
Day 0, 10:00 AM

Alex is breathing steadier. The infection stopped spreading. He tells you about the Bloom - fungal outbreak, started 3 days ago, spreads through spores and bites.

'The hospital has more pills. Third floor, green wing, locker 47.'

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Plan a hospital run to get more pills
Fortify the apartment and wait it out
Ask Alex about escape routes out of the city
Check if other neighbors are alive

alex_dies.text:
You stay silent. You hear Alex scream. Wet tearing. Then moaning. Through the peephole: he's one of them now. White eyes, dark veins.

You're safe. He's dead. You can still hear his last words.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Break down - what have you done?
Push emotion aside, check your supplies

plan_hospital.text:
You plan the hospital run. It's 6 blocks through infected territory. Alex draws a map. You need weapons, supplies, and courage.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Prepare thoroughly - gather weapons and plan route
Go now while it's still morning
Send Alex alone - he knows the hospital

fortify_apartment.text:
You seal windows, barricade doors. Alex helps despite his weakness. Outside, you hear more infected gathering.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Work together with Alex to fortify
Focus on your bedroom only - personal safety first

guilt_breakdown.text:
You collapse against the door, sobbing. Alex died because of you. The weight is crushing.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Force yourself to breathe and recover
Call someone - you need to hear a human voice
Let the guilt consume you completely

cold_survival.text:
Emotion is weakness. You inventory supplies: 3 days food, 5 days water. You need more.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Ration strictly and wait for rescue
Break into the corner store downstairs

hospital_prep.text:
Day 1. You spend hours preparing. Weapons: kitchen knife, baseball bat. Route mapped. Alex is nervous but ready.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Alex should stay - he's still weak

check_neighbors.text:
You knock on 3C. Mrs. Chen answers - terrified but alive. Her daughter is infected, locked in the bathroom.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Offer to help deal with the daughter
Invite Mrs. Chen to your apartment
Give her advice but don't get involved

hospital_journey_1.text:
Day 1, 6:00 AM. Streets are chaos. Burning cars, bodies, infected everywhere. You and Alex move slowly, quietly.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

hospital_journey_2.text:
A group of infected blocks your path. 7 of them. You could sneak past or fight through.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

hospital_journey_3.text:
You're inside the hospital. It's a nightmare. Blood everywhere. Infected wandering halls. But you see the green wing.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: This is too dangerous - leave now

green_wing.text:
Third floor. Locker 47. You find it: 50 pills. Enough for months. Then you hear screaming from the ICU.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Take pills and search for more supplies

help_chen.text:
You deal with Chen's infected daughter. It's brutal. Traumatic. But Mrs. Chen is grateful. She joins your group.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

choices.text: Set strict rules for her staying
She can help but you're in charge

teamwork_fortify.text:
Day 2. You and Alex work as a team. The apartment is becoming a fortress. You hear a broadcast: military quarantine zones established.

Your hands shake from exhaustion and adrenaline. The weight of command presses down. Every face in your group represents a choice you made - to save them or not. The Bloom pulses outside, a living nightmare of fungal horror.

You discover a radio transmission from survivors organizing at the stadium

The Bloom spreads relentlessly. Spores drift like toxic snow. The infected grow more organized daily. Your group looks to you for leadership.

The Bloom has peaked. The infected swarm the streets in thousands. Your group has dwindled or grown based on your choices. Trust is everything now.

A final crisis: the settlement is under siege. You must make one last defining choice.
